titles.title: To offer persistent poverty counties and political subdivisions of such counties the opportunity to have their rural development loans restructured.
To offer persistent poverty counties and political subdivisions of such counties the opportunity to have their rural development loans restructured.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Subcommittee on Commodity Exchanges, Energy, and Credit.
